text: The Nishan-e-Pakistan (Grand Cross of the Order of Pakistan) is the second highest grade of the highest ranking order given by the Government of Pakistan. The honour may be given to a citizen from a foreign country. Richard Nixon,Richard Nixon, Remarks on Accepting the Nishan-e-Pakistan Mahathir Mohamad, Dwight D. Eisenhower, Queen Elizabeth II and Nelson Mandela were among the foreigners. The award was created on 19 March 1957. ==References== ==Other websites== * Decorations and Medals of Pakistan Category:1957 establishments in Asia Category:Nishan-e-Pakistan Category:1950s establishments in Pakistan
title: Nishan-e-Pakistan
